commit.message:
re PR target/32847 (FAIL: tmpdir-g++.dg-struct-layout-1/t028 cp_compat_y_tst.o compile,  (ICE))

	PR target/32847

	(casesi32p, casesi64p): Likewise.
	(casesi): Adjust for above.

files.patch:
